item.title: [PI] wierd shop glitch? help pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @vividnemesis vividnemesis
item.description:
@vividnemesis wrote:

Im sorry for not explaining it … but lets say that ive sold 5 diffrent items to a blank shop.
if i buy the first item i sold. then all the other items dissapear from the shop(leaving it blank again) but if i sell the item back. i can see all the 5 items i sold…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] wierd shop glitch? help pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

I have seen this in servers before. its for all items. if you all of 1 stack of items from the shop, so that it disappears. it will then hide the objects found after it. (at least 2 of them are removed, the glitch)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] wierd shop glitch? help pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

Go to Items DB then search for the visage ID and sled ID then go to your source and search for every code that contain the both ID’s and check how this happens.

item.title: [PI] wierd shop glitch? help pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @enahsh2o enahsh2o
item.description:
@enahsh2o wrote:

I can’t seem to figure out what you are trying to say :
The only thing I noticed was the anti-fire shield went from 1000 to 1001.

EDIT: So you are saying that if you sell multiple items to the shop, then buy back the first item you sold to the shop, then all of the items go back into your inventory?
If that is the problem, I am not sure how you would go about fixing that. Sorry.

Read full topic
